description:
Kenshin defeats a local mob`s most powerful fighter, only to then face a gang leader who`s determined to spread powerful new guns across Japan.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: En Güçlü Adama Veda / Işık ve Gölgenin Çarpışması
O Confronto Entre a Luz e a Escuridão
Saraba Saikyou no Otoko-tachi! Hikari to Yami no Gekitotsu
ฝ่ายธรรมะย่อมชนะอธรม
さらば最強の男たち! 光と闇の激突
